title.description: A brief title for the rule that should contain what the rules is supposed to detect

id.description: A globally unique identifier for the Sigma rule. This is recommended to be a UUID v4, but not mandatory.

description.description: A short description of the rule and the malicious activity that can be detected

logsource.description: The log source that the rule is supposed to detect malicious activity in.

category.description: Group of products, like firewall or process_creation

service.description: A subset of a product's logs, like sshd

global_filter.description: A set of search-identifiers that represent properties of searches on log data

additionalProperties.description: A Search Identifier: A definition that can consist of two different data structures - lists and maps.

condition.description: The relationship between the search identifiers to create the detection logic. Ex: selection1 or selection2
